meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Brian Wangsgard Chris Keyser Michael Herman Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1015.

td.p: Brian Wangsgard, a senior marketing representative from Redlands, California
Chris Keyser, a writer originally from New York
Michael Herman, an arts management consultant originally from Houston, Texas (whose 2-day cash winnings total $12,400)

tr.td: SCIENCE
FOOTBALL
FASHION
AMERICAN REVOLUTION
COUNTRY CROONERS
MORTAL MATTERS

$8,000
North Carolina')
